reviewText:
I bought this film because the amazing Shawn lanes music is in the soundtrack.

Its one the best new films I have seen my son is a film major and loved it.

Buy this film its great and you will laugh and cry and be drawn in instantly.

6 stars

Oh  PS... Set your players for region 2  USA is region 1
it will play I watched it today on a mac set to region 2.

Its worth every second of time to watch it..

You will feel better for doing so..

Three Italian Academy awards and five other nominations. Interesting film about actual Italian society and the problems ordinary people have to face nowadays. The solutions, legal or illegal, they find are always morally tenable. Recommended.
